mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Aproducts (ser, userid, itemid) values (Aproduct.nextval, #{userid}, #{itemid})
mapper.select: SELECT a.pnum, a.buy, a.idate,a.prompt, a.pname, a.file1, a.subject, a.price, a.readcnt, TO_CHAR(a.regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS regdate FROM amem m JOIN aproducts ap ON m.id = ap.userid JOIN auction a ON ap.itemid = a.pnum WHERE m.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.pnum DESC

SELECT b.userid, b.pnum, b.prompt, b.pname, b.file1, b.subject, b.price, b.readcnt, TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS regdate FROM amem a JOIN auction b ON a.id = b.userid WHERE a.id = #{loggedInUserId} ORDER BY b.pnum DESC

SELECT Tier FROM ( SELECT COUNT(pnum) as total_pnum, CASE WHEN COUNT(pnum) < 3 THEN 'Silver' WHEN COUNT(pnum) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 'Gold' WHEN COUNT(pnum) BETWEEN 7 AND 10 THEN 'Platinum' ELSE 'Diamond' END AS Tier FROM auction WHERE userid = #{userid} GROUP BY userid )
